Description.p:
A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes a code to indicate this is a Continuing Health Care Rejection Response message type.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CHCRejectionMessageType subset where the subset original id has yet to be defined.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
This is a new vocabulary created for the HSCI domain.
